summary: This document is an email correspondence from Harry Beller to Amanda Kirby regarding the confirmation of shares received for Southern Financial LLC. It discusses specific financial transactions involving shares of two funds.

persons.name: Harry Beller
persons.context: Harry Beller is following up on a financial transaction related to Southern Financial LLC.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is the recipient of the email and is asked to confirm the receipt of shares for Southern Financial LLC.

keyFacts: Harry Beller is inquiring about the confirmation of shares received for Southern Financial LLC.
The email mentions specific numbers of shares for two different funds.
The document is marked as confidential under federal rules.
